title: How often are movies added to Amazon Prime? - Quora
tags: Amazon Prime Video (Video on demand service)

response.answer_text: Not nearly enough. I find Amazon’s movie selection the weakest out of all the streaming services. At first glance it looks like they have a great selection, however most of them you will need to pay a fee to watch. I feel it’s a bit deceptive, so I cancelled my Prime subscription. I think you’ll be better off exploring other options, such as Hulu or Netflix. Even VUDU has a wider variety of free movies, way more than Amazon.
